What is (are) Paranasal Sinus and Nasal Cavity Cancer ?,"Key Points
                    - Paranasal sinus and nasal cavity cancer is a disease in which malignant (cancer) cells form in the tissues of the paranasal sinuses and nasal cavity.    - Differe
